SELECT Z.* ,CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.ORD , A.PRJ_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.PRJ_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00013', A.PRJ_TYPE, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , A.PRJ_ACRM , A.PRJ_GRP_CD , B.USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A, ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 A , ADM1100 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID, A.USR_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND (A.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR B.USR_ID IS NOT NULL)
AND A.USE_CD = '01'
) Z WHERE 1=1
AND USE_CD = #search_useCd#
AND PRJ_NM LIKE '%'||#txtSearch#||'%'
AND PRJ_ID LIKE '%'||#txtSearch#||'%'
AND PRJ_GRP_CD = #prjGrpCd#
CONNECT BY PRIOR Z.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_GRP_ID START WITH Z.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL ORDER SIBLINGS BY Z.ORD, Z.PRJ_NM

SELECT PRJ_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , ORD , PRJ_DESC , USE_CD , PRJ_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00013', PRJ_TYPE, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , PRJ_ACRM , PRJ_GRP_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A1 WHERE A1.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# ORDER BY A1.ORD ASC
SELECT * FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01'
SELECT * FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02'

SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.ORD ,A.PRJ_GRP_ID ,A.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.PRJ_NM ,B.ACCESS_YN ,B.SELECT_YN ,B.REG_YN ,B.MODIFY_YN ,B.DEL_YN FROM PRJ1000 A , ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.ACCESS_YN ,A.SELECT_YN, A.REG_YN, A.MODIFY_YN, A.DEL_YN FROM ( SELECT * FROM ADM1200 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Z.MENU_ID = '000200060001' ) A LEFT JOIN ADM1300 B ON(A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.ACCESS_YN ,A.SELECT_YN, A.REG_YN, A.MODIFY_YN, A.DEL_YN ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND ACCESS_YN = 'Y' AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #selPrjGrpId# ORDER BY A.ORD

, PRJ_TYPE = #prjType#
